string.value: In Search of the Book of Ancient
The wiseman of Kerning City, #bDark Lord#k, promised to give me the map piece in exchange for #b2 LUK Crystals#k.

I heard about you through #b#p1012100##k from Henesys. We don't need to necessarily talk to each other to communicate; we communicate through our minds. You've worked hard to get here. But hey...you're looking for #b#t4031056##k? Of course I also happen to have the piece of the map that shows the book's whereabouts. I've forgotten about it for a while...

But I can't just give you that. I also have been giving away a little bit of my power to all the thief-hopefuls for hundreds of years, but there have been a sudden rush of people wanting to be thieves, I've used up most of my power as a result. Get me #b2 #t4005003#s#k and I'll help you find #b#t4031056##k. What do you think? Do you want to do it?

Good choice. #t4005003# is something you can acquire from the monsters on land. Of course it won't be easy to get them but still, I think you are capapble of doing it. I'll be waiting for you here. Best of luck to you!
Hmmm...but without my help you won't ever be able to find #b#t4031056##k...Anyway if you have a change of heart, feel free to come back.

Exploring is good, and getting stronger is good and all...but don't you want to enjoy living the life as you know it? How about becoming a Rogue like us and really LIVE the life? Sounds fun, isn't it?

You haven't gotten #b2 #t4005003#s#k yet. You'll find it from time to time through the monsters at land. Of course it won't be easy to get them, but still, I think you are capable of doing it. I'll be waiting for you here. Best of luck to you!
